channel.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED] A new subboard - not really a great big matter
channel.description:
[s]I was thinking that we need a "requests" subboard for Web design/development (since I've seen a lot of topics on people requesting web developers). It's not a great big thing, it's just a small thing that'd make the forums a bit better.[/s]
[quote="Loveandpower"]I would support [b]a direct tutorial section though and it could have required tags like [RUBY] [HTML] etc[/b][/quote] I changed my suggestion. This idea would make the web development board a bit more clearer, and more organised. And it'll also help new people to find tutorials, instead of going through hundreds of pages.

item.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED] A new subboard - not really a great big matter
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:11, topic:522408”]We discussed this at our last staff meeting (a week ago today) and none of us really seen any need for it. Sorry for the delayed reply to it as a suggestion on the whole, but until there’s a lot more activity in and around that board it’ll stay as is.[/quote]Good. It seems redundant to have a board for something like anything suggested here.

Read full topic
item.source: [RESOLVED - DENIED] A new subboard - not really a great big matter

item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

We discussed this at our last staff meeting (a week ago today) and none of us really seen any need for it. Sorry for the delayed reply to it as a suggestion on the whole, but until there’s a lot more activity in and around that board it’ll stay as is.

Read full topic

item.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED] A new subboard - not really a great big matter
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

I don’t support a request section for it cause I agree they should at least learn basic stuff even if they can’t do a whole lot something is better than nothing. I would support a direct tutorial section though and it could have required tags like [RUBY] [HTML] etc

Read full topic

item.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED] A new subboard - not really a great big matter
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

I was thinking that we need a “requests” subboard for Web design/development (since I’ve seen a lot of topics on people requesting web developers). It’s not a great big thing, it’s just a small thing that’d make the forums a bit better.

Loveandpower:

I would support a direct tutorial section though and it could have required tags like [RUBY] [HTML] etc

I changed my suggestion. This idea would make the web development board a bit more clearer, and more organised. And it’ll also help new people to find tutorials, instead of going through hundreds of pages.
